__e: How do you explain the disappearance of an entire township then, Frank?
I have come here from the mainland to investigate the disappearance of a young girl.
I am here to investigate the disappearance of a young girl as doubtless, the harbour master has already told you by now.
At 2:00 this afternoon, Charles Gilman goes on trial for the murder of Fred Wilk.
Sir, he may be responsible for a man's disappearance.
No, somebody important like you. It would be noticed.
You mean Mom's disappearance and everything?
"Which, at this moment, seems pointless..." "Given that, thank God, no more children have gone missing."
No, somebody important like you. It would be noticed.
"Perhaps you also know who is suspected of causing the Father's disappearance?" causing the Father's disappearance?"
I'm sorry, but I can't celebrate my brother's demise as you seem to.
She knows nothing further about her husband's disappearance.
And I want to remind you that since the disappearance of my daughter...
The best thing for you to do is to get to London where you can rest... and leave us to make inquiries into the disappearance of your mother.
The mystery of her disappearance probably intrigues him.
No, no, this was after she disappeared.
Yes, your State Department has informed me of her disappearance.
It arrived on the morning of his disappearance.
Can you account for his disappearance in anyway?
The morning after he disappeared, you went out on your yacht.
I'm a double agent working for both sides and I can tell you who's behind the disappearances of the CONTROL couriers.
Well, Max, the case of the disappearing CONTROL agents is a closed book, thanks to you.
Some people even think that the police is behind..
